original_text: (This was the promise of the Lord that he gave to Jehu, “Your sons shall sit on the throne of Israel to the fourth generation.” And so it came to pass.)
korean_text: 여호와께서 예후에게 말씀하여 이르시기를 네 자손이 사 대 동안 이스라엘 왕위에 있으리라 하신 그 말씀대로 과연 그렇게 되니라

sentences.original_text: This was the promise of the Lord
“Your sons shall sit on the throne of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아들들이 이스라엘의 왕위에 앉을 것이니

sentences.original_text: And so it came to pass.
